channel.title: Character file help
channel.description: ok i have this in my client.java: [code] characterfile.write("character-registry = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(registry), 0, Integer.toString(registry).length()); characterfile.newLine();[/code] Now i want my server to save the character-registry level as 1 instead of 0 by default to each character, so i don't have to do that via Their character files. That is all i ask.

item.title: Character file help
item.dc:creator: @12mil 12mil
item.description:
@12mil wrote:

ok i have this in my client.java:

characterfile.write("character-registry = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(registry), 0, Integer.toString(registry).length()); characterfile.newLine();
Now i want my server to save the character-registry level as 1 instead of 0 by default to each character, so i donâ€™t have to do that via Their character files.
That is all i ask.
